sentences.en: This is an entirely computer-operated system which is very user-friendly.
sentences.cn: 这是一个完全由计算机操作的系统，非常好用。

sentences.en: It was really informative and very user-friendly.
sentences.cn: 它提供了大量信息，而且非常人性化。

sentences.en: The four books I keep at hand are user-friendly.
sentences.cn: 我手头保存的这四本是比较容易掌握的。
